statements: UPDATE research_findings_env_effects SET findings = 'Positive effects observed' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE research_findings_env_effects SET ecosystem_name = 'Forest' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE research_findings_env_effects SET findings = 'Increased pollution levels in the ecosystem' WHERE ecosystem_name = 'Amazon Rainforest';
UPDATE research_findings_env_effects SET ecosystem_name = 'Arctic Tundra', research_topic = 'Impact of global warming' WHERE id = 5;
UPDATE research_findings SET effect_description = 'Increased Growth Rate' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET research_location = 'Lab' WHERE researcher_id = 2;
UPDATE research_findings SET effect_description = 'Decreased growth rate due to gmo', ecosystem_name = 'Forest' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE researchers SET research_location = 'Lab', researcher_name = 'Alice' WHERE researcher_id = 3;
UPDATE research_findings SET findings_text = 'Updated findings for study A' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE gmo_effects SET effect_description = 'Revised effect description' WHERE gmo_strain = 'Strain X';
UPDATE research_findings SET study_title='New Study Title', researcher_name='John Doe', eco_system='Forest' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE gmo_effects SET effect_type='Negative Effect', effect_description='This is a negative effect description.', eco_system='Agricultural Field' WHERE gmo_strain = 'BT-Corn';
UPDATE research_findings SET effect_on_environment = 'Decreased biodiversity' WHERE id = 1
UPDATE researchers SET email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE name = 'John Doe'
UPDATE research_findings SET effect_on_environment = 'Positive' WHERE ecosystem = 'Amazon Rainforest';
UPDATE researchers SET email = 'researcher@example.com' WHERE name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE GMO_Research SET crop_type='Wheat', findings='Improved yield' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Ecosystems SET climate='Tropical', vegetation='Rainforest' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE GMO_Research SET crop_type = 'Corn', research_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Ecosystems SET vegetation = 'Deciduous trees, grasses', climate = 'Temperate', ecosystem_name = 'Temperate Forest' WHERE id = 3;
